error.moreThanOneGeneralFeedback: There cannot be more than one general Feedback per Assessment.
error.assessmentDueDateOver: The assessment due date of this exercise is over.

assessment.assessmentLockedCurrentUser: You have the lock for this assessment

messages.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel the assessment? Your current assessment progress will be deleted and the submission will be available for assessment to other tutors again.
messages.lock: You do now have the lock on this submission. Only you can assess this model. Please assess this model before opening other submissions.
messages.confirmSubmission: You have not assessed all model elements. Are you sure you want to submit this assessment? You will not be able to change it afterwards.
